_header: God that madest all and sum
_description: A prayer for use at St. Gregory’s Trental — thirteen lines, ends incompletely

Lam559.First Lines:
God þat madist all and sumand ȝeldist thi silf for our
                    raunsom…
Lam559.Last Lines:
…the peopul lord of misbelyuethorow the uertu wil
                    preueAnd lord for thi gret pitethou help them that…
Lam559.Note:
Written as prose. Immediately following the last line transcribed above
                    is ‘Here begynneth the passion of oure lord Ihesu criste’ (f. 89,
                    foot of page, in rubric)
Lam559.Attributed Title:
And thes masses I the pray wit in viij dayes of the same fest tha
                    thou hem say ȝet thou hast weill more to do this orison muste thou say
                    there to (f. 88v, rubric)
